title: Personalized Social Education Design Utilizing Learning Analytics

context.prior_knowledge: Understanding of basic social studies concepts and experience using online learning tools
context.additional_context: Learners are office/administrative professionals studying outside work hours, accessing content flexibly via personal devices, with project-based assessments evaluating real-world problem-solving abilities

learning_goals: Learners can design three or more personalized feedback strategies based on interpretations of learning analytics data.
Learners can select analytical metrics based on instructional design documents and develop action plans for process improvement.
Learners can enhance educational effectiveness by over 20% using analysis results of checkpoints (progress rate/assignment submission) and processes (engagement patterns/interactions).
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
